alert.note: Alert for Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 5:31PM EDT until May 26 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Nicholas County in central Kentucky... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 531 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carlisle, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Nicholas County, including the following locations... Sprout, Weston, Moorefield, Pleasant Valley and Myers. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
